alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 12:02PM EST until December 19 at 11:05PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Maine... Sandy River At Mercer affecting Franklin and Somerset Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sandy River at Mercer. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, flooding in Farmington along Main Street south of the University. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 AM EST Monday the stage was 8.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon, then crest around 16.5 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
